title: Ziggy Marley's 'Fly Rasta' Up For Grammy
teaser: Marley's album has been nominated for a Grammy for Best Reggae Album, an award he won last year with "Ziggy Marley in Concert."
contentencoded:
Ziggy Marley‘s album “Fly Rasta” has been nominated for a Grammy for Best Reggae Album, an award he won last year with “Ziggy Marley in Concert.”

“Fly Rasta” came out in April, along with Ziggy Marley’s children’s book “I Love You Too.” Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson spoke to Ziggy Marley back in June. Today we revisit that conversation.

Guest

  • Ziggy Marley, Jamaican musician and leader of the band, Ziggy Marley and the Melody Makers. He tweets @ziggymarley.
